EmailTemplate.name: MC-202209-HHS-ENT-EM-CHILDREN'S-MERCY-CASE-STUDY.Case Study Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Case study: Children's Mercy Kansas City
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Image Single mother playing with young sons on couch
Even before the pandemic, the outpatient virtual care strategy of Children’s Mercy Hospital played a critical role in ensuring that pediatric patients in the region had access to subspecialty care. Learn how the health system is using the Solo platform of Teladoc Health to build on this momentum and offer an exponentially greater range of services, including:
A 70% increase in telehealth-enabled clinical specialties in just four years A direct-to-patient virtual care service that connects people to a Children’s Mercy pediatric provider from home, plus interpreters in 67 languages Integration with the electronic health record (EHR) system to ease scheduling, provide automated patient notifications and ensure immediate and secure access to patient information
Get the case study <[[https://teladochealth.com/resources/case-study/extending-the-reach-and-impact-of-pediatric-specialists-with-telehealth/?&utm_source=marketing&utm_medium=email&utm_content=case-study&utm_campaign=peds-22&utm_campaign_id=2022-hhs-momentum]]>
About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
